mapper.select: select count(1) from t_likes c where c.weibo_id=#{weiboId} and c.user_id=#{userId}
select count(1) from t_likes c where c.weibo_id=#{weiboId}
select c.weibo_id as weiboId from t_likes c where c.user_id=#{userId} order by c.like_time desc
select count(1) from t_likes c where c.weibo_id in( select w.id from t_weibo w where w.user_id=#{userId} )

select c.user_id as userId, c.weibo_id as weiboId, c.like_time as likeTime, u.username, u.face, u.id as nowUserId, w.content from t_likes c left join t_user u on u.id = c.user_id left join t_weibo w on w.id = c.weibo_id where c.weibo_id in( select w.id from t_weibo w where w.user_id=#{userId} ) order by c.like_time desc
